channel.title: k3s on 网中维

item.title: Install_rancher
item.description: 系统优化 yum install -y epel-release yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 yum install -y ntpdate ntpdate cn.pool.ntp.org setenforce 0 sed -i "s/^SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g"
